Landing.MainTitle: An atmosphere of easy and progressive communication
Landing.MainDescription: Sign up for a linguistic club and learn foreign languages by communicating. The Lingua Govorun communicative method will allow you to start speaking from the very first lesson

ChooseUs.Title: Why choosing us
ChooseUs.Argument1.Title: Small groups
ChooseUs.Argument1.Description: You will get more attention from our experts and you will have more opportunities to practice.
ChooseUs.Argument2.Title: Qualified specialists
ChooseUs.Argument2.Description: With a linguistic or pedagogical education. We are in love with foreign languages and are passionate about our cause,
ChooseUs.Argument3.Title: Reasonable prices
ChooseUs.Argument3.Description: What are you waiting for? Sign up for a free trial lesson.
ChooseUs.Argument4.Title: Mobility
ChooseUs.Argument4.Description: You can study from anywhere in the world. All you need is an Internet access and a great mood.

Pink.Title: We erase any boundaries, we break down any barriers
Pink.Description: Thanks to our communicative method, you will speak in another language from the first session. Constant feed-back and support from our experts, a friendly and motivational atmosphere during our webinars help to prevent all your fears and overcome all the barriers in your learning process.

Teacher.Title: A language determines our thinking. By learning a foreign language, we acquire a more open mind.
Teacher.Name: Natalia Kanaeva
Teacher.Description: Certified translator of French and Spanish. Leading teacher of the Lingua-Govorun linguistic club, an expert in the field of online education.
Teacher.Point2: Graduated from the Moscow University and Collège Universitaire Français.
Teacher.Point3: Working professionally as a translator since 2013.

Register.Title: Start with a free course
Register.Description: It's very simple! Give us your phone number or email, and one of our representative will contact you.

HowTo.Title: How to subscribe to our courses
HowTo.Description: It's very simple! Follow the steps

Step1.Title: Send us a request
Step1.Description: You can send your contact details below in the registration form and a free lesson or just write us a message.

Step2.Title: A club employee will call you
Step2.Description: A bit of patience! our representative will call you back within 24 hours to arrange an appointment and make an appointment for the first lesson.

Step3.Title: Participation in a trial lesson
Step3.Description: Attention! Payment for the first lesson is not charged. You participate at a convenient time for you.

Step4.Title: Agreement on the terms of the contract
Step4.Description: Our representative will call you back within 24 hours to find out your impressions and agree on the terms of the contract.

Step5.Title: Sign the contract
Step5.Description: You sign the contract and send a copy of it to us by e-mail.

Step6.Title: Make a prepayment for a month
Step6.Description: You can make a prepayment in any convenient way. All payments are securely protected.

Step7.Title: Enjoy your classes
Step7.Description: The club employee directs you to access the conference on the platform. You can start learning.

Presentation.Title: French language from A1 to the expertise
Presentation.Description: Speaking French has never been so easy! Sign up for a trial lesson and start speaking.

Presentation.Title: Spanish language from A1 to the expertise
Presentation.Description: Speaking Spanish has never been so easy! Sign up for a trial lesson and start speaking.
